products.NAME: Inference Simulator By HUNI
products.DESCRIPTION: This Tool Provides A Mechanism To Simulate Deployment Configurations For ML Models,  By Identifying Suitable Protocols And HW Configuration Required For Performant Applications
products.INTEGRATION: CAN BE USED, DEPLOYED AND/OR INTEGRATED IN ANY TOOLCHAIN.

products.NAME: AutoML Robust Tester By HUNI
products.DESCRIPTION: A Research On How Robust The Models Generated By Different AutoML Approaches Are.
products.RESTRICTIONS: THE ARTIFACT IS LIMITED TO A SPECIFIC ENVIRONMENT OR OS
products.INTEGRATION: THE RESULT OF THE ARTIFACT CAN BE USED AS A REPORT TO PROVIDE INSIGHTS TO OTHER ACTOR IN THE AI LIFECYCLE

products.NAME: Deeper: Simulation Integrated Bio-Inspired Test Generator By RISE
products.DESCRIPTION: A Simulation-Based Test Generator That Uses An Evolutionary Process (i.e., Mainly NSGAII) For Generating Test Cases To Test A DNN-Based Lane Keeping System In Automotive Domain
products.RESTRICTIONS: THE ARTIFACT COULD BE USED AS AN ONLINE SERVICE OR ACCESSED VIA ONLINE API
products.INTEGRATION: CAN BE USED, DEPLOYED AND/OR INTEGRATED IN ANY TOOLCHAIN.

products.NAME: ESG: FinTech By CCTL/NetCheck
products.DESCRIPTION: A Set Of Services To Process News For ESG Ivestment, Classify News And Detect/reject Synthetic Text
products.INTEGRATION: AN API OR ENDPOINT COULD BE DEPLOYED TO COMMUNICATE WITH THE ARTIFACT (LOAD, EXPORT DATA)

products.NAME: ESG: FinTech By CCTL/NetCheck
products.DESCRIPTION: A Set Of Services To Process News For ESG Ivestment, Classify News And Detect/reject Synthetic Text
products.INTEGRATION: AN API OR ENDPOINT COULD BE DEPLOYED TO COMMUNICATE WITH THE ARTIFACT (LOAD, EXPORT DATA)

products.NAME: Data Quality Wrapper By Sogeti
products.DESCRIPTION: An App For Automated EDA, Preprocessing And Data Quality Report Generation. Its Goal Is To Automate The Preprocessing Of Data, But Also Educate Aspiring And Experienced Data Scientists About Different Methods That Can Be Used To Improve Its Quality.
products.INTEGRATION: CAN BE USED, DEPLOYED AND/OR INTEGRATED IN ANY TOOLCHAIN.

products.NAME: QAIF By Sogeti
products.DESCRIPTION: A Cohesive, Generic Framework That Can Be Tailored To A Specific AI Solution In A Given Context Covering: Project Phase, Processes, Outcomes, Governance And People.

products.NAME: Machine Spraak (Acoustic Analysis: QA Of Audio Data) By Solita
products.DESCRIPTION: A Tool For Audio Experimentation. The Tool Collects Audio Data And Experiment Meta Data. It Enables Further Analysis In The Cloud.
products.INTEGRATION: THE RESULT OF THE ARTIFACT CAN BE USED AS A REPORT TO PROVIDE INSIGHTS TO OTHER ACTOR IN THE AI LIFECYCLE

products.NAME: MACAU By VTT
products.DESCRIPTION: MACAU Is A Wrapper Class For State-Of-The-Art Tree-Based LightGBM Algorithm Which Enables Adding Both Aleatoric And Epistemic Uncertainty Via A Proxy To LightGBM. MACAU Is Based On Tree-Introspection Accompanied With Proxy Models For Uncertainty Modelling. Additionally, MACAU Enables Adding Additional Non-Linearities To The Model Which Enables The Model To Capture Smooth Non-Linearities Better Than Vanilla RF.
products.INTEGRATION: THE ARTIFACT CAN BE IMPORTED AS A LIBRARY/PACKAGE IN ANY IDE OR CAN BE WRAPPED TO BE USED

products.NAME: Data Quality OT Simulation Rig By WithSecure
products.DESCRIPTION: A Flexible Platform Which Allows The Simulation Of Wide Variety Of Different Scenarios Where OT Can Be Found, This Includes But Is Not Limited To Industrial Facilities, Marine Vessels And Trains.

products.TOOL-NAME: Monitoring system for plastic injection molding machine.
products.DESCRIPTION: Simulate the behaviour, through GAN networks trained to simulate both good and bad data.
products.INTEGRATION: AN API OR ENDPOINT COULD BE DEPLOYED TO COMMUNICATE WITH THE ARTIFACT (LOAD, EXPORT DATA)

products.TOOL-NAME: Synthetic MRI data by VTT and PHILIPS
products.DESCRIPTION: This tool is used to generate synthetic T1-weighted brain MR images. The tool overcomes privacy and availability issues with real data, by generating synthetic data that can be used in its place.
products.INTEGRATION: THIS IS A FRAMEWORK, NOT DESIGNED TO BE INTEGRATED IN A TOOLCHAIN
